publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: systematic administrative procedures
this man, this fellow
this man, this fellow

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: In the Annals the attacker is called kè

sense.def: launch a formal attack

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the attackee is called kè. 何休注:伐人者為客，讀伐長言之，齊人語也。見伐者為主，讀伐短言之，齊人語也。"

sense.def: get attacked; be attacked
enter by force (without necessarily occupying)
入者何也？得而不居也。enter and gain typically temprorary possession of (a city)
female of marriagable age; 宮婦,室婦
female of marriagable age; 宮婦,室婦
become linked in marriage to

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (He) being from Wu, why does it not refer to him as as a Viscount?

sense.def: to what purpose? why?

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (He) being from Wu, why does it not refer to him as as a Viscount?

sense.def: call the understood object by the name N2

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (He) being from Wu, why does it not refer to him as as a Viscount?

sense.def: call the understood object by the name N2

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (He) being from Wu, why does it not refer to him as as a Viscount?

sense.def: viscount

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: That is because he turned back to his barbarian ways.

sense.def: revert to (old ways etc), turn back to

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: That is because he turned back to his barbarian ways.

sense.def: barbarianism; barbarian ways

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: What did this returning to the barbarian ways consist in?

sense.def: barbarianism; barbarian ways

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: What did this returning to the barbarian ways consist in?

sense.def: how concretely did one V? How is one to V, How is one to manage to V

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: What did this returning to the barbarian ways consist in?

sense.def: the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (The answer is this:) A ruler is to reside in the ruler's place,

sense.def: the ruler as being primarily administratively in charge of people

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (The answer is this:) A ruler is to reside in the ruler's place,

sense.def: take temporary lodging (with somebody or in a certain place); (of army) encamp at

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (The answer is this:) A ruler is to reside in the ruler's place,

sense.def: (typically in formal or archaic contexts for the different word 於) in, at, on, by; referring to the future in this construction

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (The answer is this:) A ruler is to reside in the ruler's place,

sense.def: designed for a ruler, appropiate for the ruler

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the dignitaries are to reside in the place of the dignitaries.

sense.def: a notable; a dignitary

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the dignitaries are to reside in the place of the dignitaries.

sense.def: take temporary lodging (with somebody or in a certain place); (of army) encamp at

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the dignitaries are to reside in the place of the dignitaries.

sense.def: (typically in formal or archaic contexts for the different word 於) in, at, on, by; referring to the future in this construction

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the dignitaries are to reside in the place of the dignitaries.

sense.def: designed for a dignitary

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (In this case) it would appear that he had it off with the mother of the king of Chǔ.

sense.def: Apparently 蓋聞 marks a tentative report on what one has heard but does not necessarily believe

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: (In this case) it would appear that he had it off with the mother of the king of Chǔ.

sense.def: have sex with

seg.line: 吳主會則曷為先言晉侯

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳主會則曷為先言晉侯

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Since Wú was in charge of the meeting why does it first mention the Marquis of Jìn?

sense.def: be in charge of (a meeting etc)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳主會則曷為先言晉侯

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Since Wú was in charge of the meeting why does it first mention the Marquis of Jìn?

sense.def: be the host of (a meeting)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳主會則曷為先言晉侯

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Since Wú was in charge of the meeting why does it first mention the Marquis of Jìn?

sense.def: why was it that S? sometimes emphatically doubtful: how (on earth) was it that S?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳主會則曷為先言晉侯

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Since Wú was in charge of the meeting why does it first mention the Marquis of Jìn?

sense.def: as the first, first

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳主會則曷為先言晉侯

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Since Wú was in charge of the meeting why does it first mention the Marquis of Jìn? (NOTE THE SCOPE OF 先]

sense.def: mention

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳主會則曷為先言晉侯

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Since Wú was in charge of the meeting why does it first mention the Marquis of Jìn? (NOTE THE SCOPE OF 先]

sense.def: then, as a rule [examples here need to be cleaned up!!!]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳主會則曷為先言晉侯

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Since Wú was in charge of the meeting why does it first mention the Marquis of Jìn? (NOTE THE SCOPE OF 先]

sense.def: a meeting, assembly

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: One would not go along with the ruler of barbarians to be in charge of central states.

sense.def: not find oneself in N V-ing, not permit N to V, not go along with N V-ing

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: One would not go along with the ruler of barbarians to be in charge of central states.

sense.def: (any) barbarians

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: One would not go along with barbarians to be in charge of central states.

sense.def: 老之將至 "the coming arrival of old age" nominaliser converting a sentence with a verbal predicate into an abstract nominalisation (sometimes best rendered in English not with a nominalisation but a that-clause when in object position)

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: One would not go along with barbarians to be in charge of central states.

sense.def: be in charge of (a meeting etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: One would not go along with barbarians to be in charge of central states.

sense.def: central states(central within the Four Seas, often, but not always, excluding states like Chu and Qin)

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: This is because one would not go along with barbarians to be in charge of central states.

sense.def: 陋也"it is because they are vulgar": be because of S; be a matter of S, depend on S

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Why does it "with the Viscount of Chǔ?"

sense.def: 其來 "his coming" npro nominalises a verb phrase it precedes

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Why does it "with the Viscount of Chǔ?"

sense.def: of texts: write, formulate (as follows)

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: This is an expression for the organising a meeting of two leaders.

sense.def: convene a meetin of; take the initiative for a meeting with (another party)

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: This is an expression for the organising a meeting of two leaders.

sense.def: two, a couple of; the pair of

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: This is an expression for the organising a meeting of two leaders.

sense.def: LH: 出口為言，集札為辭 expression; pronouncement; phrasing; text; discourse; rhetoric of speech

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: If one was not going along with the ruler of barbarians being in charge of central states

sense.def: not permit (the occurence of) S

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: If one was not going along with the ruler of barbarians being in charge of central states

sense.def: be in charge of (a meeting etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: If one was not going along with the ruler of barbarians being in charge of central states

sense.def: central states(central within the Four Seas, often, but not always, excluding states like Chu and Qin)
A central state

seg.line: 則曷為以會兩伯之辭言之

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則曷為以會兩伯之辭言之

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: why does one express this by words for "the organising of a meeting between two leaders"?

sense.def: why was it that S? sometimes emphatically doubtful: how (on earth) was it that S?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則曷為以會兩伯之辭言之

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: why does one express this by words for "organising of a meeting between two leaders"?

sense.def: of texts: write, formulate (as follows)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 則曷為以會兩伯之辭言之

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: why does one express this the formulation "organising of a meeting between two leaders"?

sense.def: put into words

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: This is because they stresses the importance of Wú.

sense.def: 陋也"it is because they are vulgar": be because of S; be a matter of S, depend on S

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: This is because they stresses the importance of Wú.

sense.def: cause to be important, introduce as politically important
why was it that S? sometimes emphatically doubtful: how (on earth) was it that S?

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Then why did they stress the importance of Wú?

sense.def: why was it that S? sometimes emphatically doubtful: how (on earth) was it that S?

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Then why did they stress the importance of Wú?

sense.def: cause to be important, introduce as politically important

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Then why did they stress the importance of Wú?

sense.def: consider as (the more) important; consider as a serious matter, take seriously, attach importance to; be chiefly concerned with; 最重

seg.line: 吳在是則天下諸侯莫敢不至也

tls:text.tls:srcline: 吳在是則天下諸侯莫敢不至也

tls:line.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: This is because when Wú is present in a certain meeting place then none of the feudal lords would fail to meet up.

sense.def: exocentric: a certain place

seg.line: 公會晉侯及吳子于黃池

tls:text.tls:srcline: 公會晉侯及吳子于黃池

sense.def: call to a meeting the persons in N1

tls:text.tls:srcline: 公會晉侯及吳子于黃池

sense.def: at the place N (ritual, high style register)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 公會晉侯及吳子于黃池

sense.def: with (in object position). [Gongyangzhuan claims that the order of constituents before and after 及 indicates difference of rank)]
give a (new) name to, choose to call by (a designation)
a meeting, assembly
row of dancers
be six in number of the contextually determinate N
be four in number (of the contetually determinate N)
